item.title: 关注乌克兰停火，石油价格接近 2021 年以来最低点
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了乌克兰停火的前景，这可能会为减少对俄罗斯原油流入已经供过于求的市场的限制铺平道路，石油维持在2021年以来的最低水平附近。【原文：Oil held near the lowest level since 2021 as traders weighed the outlook for a ceasefire in Ukraine, which could pave the way for fewer curbs on Russian crude flows into an already oversupplied market.】

item.title: 纽约称出租车和共享出行保险费率可能上涨 25
item.description: 据了解纽约州计划的人士透露，纽约州官员已告知共享出行公司、司机代表和其他出租汽车行业的人士，未来三年内保险费率将平均上涨 25%，乘客票价可能因此上涨。【原文：New York officials have told rideshare companies, driver representatives and others in the for-hire vehicle industry that insurance policy rates will rise by an average 25% over the next three years, according to people with knowledge of the state’s plans, likely sending passenger fares up as a result.】

item.title: 惠誉称：今年美国银行对竞争对手的贷款激增 26
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）的数据显示，美国银行正在向私人信贷公司、私募股权投资公司和对冲基金提供更多贷款，今年截至 11 月，向这些非银行金融机构提供的贷款额增长了 26%。【原文：US banks are lending more to private credit firms, private equity shops and hedge funds, with loan volume to these non-bank financial institutions up 26% this year through November, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 巴里克夺回马里金矿和三吨黄金
item.description: 在双方于上个月解决了长达数年的争端之后，马里恢复了巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp）对卢洛-古恩科托（Loulo-Gounkoto）矿场的控制权，并将向该公司返还三吨黄金。【原文：Mali has restored control of the Loulo-Gounkoto mine to Barrick Mining Corp. and will return three tons of gold to the company after the two sides resolved a years-long dispute last month.】

item.title: 油轮被扣押后雪佛龙降低委内瑞拉石油价格
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）在一艘油轮在加勒比海被美军扣押后，下调了提供给美国炼油厂的委内瑞拉原油价格，全球原油价格也随之走低。【原文：Chevron Corp, lowered the price of Venezuelan crude offered to US refiners after a tanker was seized by American forces in the Caribbean and as global prices drifted lower.】

item.title: 美国石油市场的关键一角正闪现供应过剩的迹象
item.description: 实物交易商密切关注的美国原油市场的一个角落正在发出供过于求的信号，这是全球供应过剩已经蔓延到美国国内的最新迹象。【原文：A corner of the US crude market closely watched by physical traders is signaling oversupply in the latest indication that a global glut has reached domestic shores.】

item.title: CommScope 资产出售后，贷款人要求赔偿 1 亿美元
item.description: CommScope Holding Co.的一些贷款人要求立即偿还贷款，并在该公司出售其关键资产后要求额外支付 1 亿多美元。【原文：Some lenders to CommScope Holding Co. are demanding an immediate repayment of their loans and more than $100 million of additional payout after the company sold its key asset.】

item.title: 法国总统莱斯库雷称参议院预算不足以缩小赤字
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，参议院版本的2026年预算将导致无法接受的巨额赤字，并呼吁在立法者努力争取在年底前稳定财政计划的同时进行重大修改。【原文：French Finance Minister Roland Lescure said the senate’s version of the 2026 budget would lead to an unacceptably wide deficit and called for major changes as lawmakers struggle to stabilize financial plans before year-end.】
